title: Queen of the Gas Station
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Gimme coffee, king-sized cup
Come on, kittycat, fill her up
What's your name, little buttercup?
That's for me to know and you to make up
[Chorus]
Love casinos, Indian reservations
But, baby, if you love me
Take me to the gas station
Gas station
[Verse 2]
Look at you smokin' in them neon lights
Under the thunder, yo, you look so nice
Made me wonder how you spend them nights
Me, I spend them looking for men I like
Like you, like you, like you
[Chorus]
Love casinos, Indian reservations
But, baby, if you love me
Take me to the gas station
Take me to the gas station
[Verse 3]
Gimme coffee, Utah love
I'm the kind of girl you dream of
And I'm trying to tell you what I dream of
And that's gas stations
With Slurpee machines and organs playing
Preferably with smokin' inside
If you can swing it (Swing it, swing it, swing it)
And I'd be real pleased if we could find one just like it
Again, again
Again, again
Again, again
Again, again, again, again, again

[Chorus]
Love casinos, Indian reservations
But, baby, if you love me
Take me to the gas station
Gas station
[Outro]
Gas station
Gas station
Gas station
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
